metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve American legal data and case laws regarding child harassment.
metadata.agentDesc: A legal researcher specializing in US case law, focusing on child harassment and abuse cases. Responsibilities include gathering and analyzing relevant legal documents and precedents.

metadata.taskDesc: Retrieve Indian legal data and case laws regarding child harassment.
metadata.agentDesc: A legal researcher specializing in Indian law regarding child rights and harassment, tasked with obtaining and interpreting relevant legal cases.

metadata.taskDesc: Research public policies in relation to child protection against harassment.
metadata.agentDesc: A researcher focused on public policies that protect children and address child harassment. Responsible for identifying effective frameworks being implemented.

metadata.taskDesc: Examine the societal and psychological impacts of child harassment.
metadata.agentDesc: A specialist in ethics and psychology, tasked with analyzing the societal implications and the psychological effects of child harassment.

metadata.taskDesc: Investigate the potential legal consequences for individuals guilty of child harassment.
metadata.agentDesc: An analyst specializing in the legal repercussions faced by offenders of child harassment, required to compile data on sentencing and legal outcomes.
